sentence: Georgia voters know that unlike political opportunist and woke leftist Stacey Abrams, Brian Kemp shares their values and works for them.? The RGA air cover for Kemp came within days of Vernon Jones dropping out of the Georgia GOP gubernatorial primary, giving Perdue an unobstructed opportunity to oust Kemp.
author: David M. Drucker
title: Republican governors buy ads in Georgia to help Brian Kemp

sentence: Now Perdue is running in the Republican primary for Georgia governor against incumbent Republican Brian Kemp, and he is hoping this time support from Trump will be enough to galvanize supporters.
title: AJC politics reporter Greg Bluestein on his new book and whether Georgia may be 'Flipped' again
Trump's going all in to trash frontrunner Brian Kemp in Georgia's GOP gubernatorial primary

author: Barnini Chakraborty
title: Brian Kemp surges ahead of Trump-backed David Perdue in Georgia GOP primary: Poll

sentence: I am proud to offer my full support for four more years of Brian Kemp as governor of the great state of Georgia!," the former vice president emphasized in a statement this weekend, as the Kemp campaign announced that Pence will campaign with Georgias conservative governor on the eve of the states May 24 primary.
title: Is Trump faceoff with Pence in Georgia GOP gubernatorial showdown an early 2024 skirmish?

author: Cheryl Teh
title: Trump is ditching David Perdue, the Georgia GOP candidate he backed who is now struggling in his gubernatorial race
